title: PropertyGuru's Australia IPO set to raise as much as $257 mln
text:
PropertyGuru's Australia IPO set to raise as much as $257 mln

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 16:30)

© Reuters. PropertyGuru's Australia IPO set to raise as much as $257 mln SINGAPORE, Oct 7 (Reuters) - Southeast Asian online realtor PropertyGuru Ltd filed a prospectus in Australia seeking an initial public offering (IPO) that could raise as much as A$380.2 million ($257 million). PropertyGuru, whose backers include buyout firms TPG Capital and KKR KKR.N , has set an indicative price range of A$3.70 to A$4.50 apiece, according to its prospectus filed with the Australian Securities and Investment Commission on Monday. Reuters had reported the company's plans to list in Australia in September. operates in Singapore, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, and Indonesia. ($1 = 1.4815 Australian dollars)
